subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kelsey Griffin had 12 points and a game-high 9 rebounds, and the Connecticut Sun earned their fourth straight win with a 76-72 victory over the Liberty in Uncasville, Conn.
snippet: Kelsey Griffin had 12 points and a game-high 9 rebounds, and the Connecticut Sun earned their fourth straight win with a 76-72 victory over the Liberty in Uncasville, Conn.
